casebody.data:
HALL
v.
TOREROS II, INC. No. 187PA06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 15, 2007. Donald H. Beskind, Raleigh, I. Beverly Lake, Jr., Jay H. Ferguson, Durham, for Theresa D. Hall. Phillip J. Anthony, Christopher J. Derrenbacher, Raleigh, Kathrine E. Downing, for Toreros, II, Inc.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2007 by Plaintiff for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion Allowed. Plaintiff (Theresa D. Hall) shall have up to and including the 28th day of March 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 15th day of February 2007."
